name: Easiest Falafel
author: jaclyncady
summary: Super quick and easy - you will probably have all the ingredients in your pantry already! Serve with your favorite sauce! I served mine with spicy mayo, made by mixing 3 tablespoons mayo with 1/2 tablespoon sriracha. It would also be great with tzatziki or spicy mustard.
ingredients: ¼ cup panko bread crumbs, or as needed
¼ cup panko bread crumbs, or as needed
1 cup olive oil for frying, or as needed
directions: Place garbanzo beans, 1/4 cup panko bread crumbs, onion, 1/4 cup olive oil, egg, parsley, curry powder, garlic powder, lemon juice, and black pepper in a food processor or blender
Blend more panko crumbs into mixture if it is too moist
Roll mixture into balls about the size of a golf ball; place on a plate
Press into patties and coat in panko bread crumbs
Heat about 1-inch olive oil in a skillet over medium heat
Pan-fry patties until crispy, about 3 minutes on each side
